title: LoL screen so zoomed in.
body: Hello fellow summoners, i just changed from playing lol on mac, to pc and the in game screen is so zoomed in. I mean like it's not the mouse scroll issue, it's like everything on the map is so big and oversized. My map screen vision has decreased because of this. Any help is appreciated. :)

replies.body: Have you tried going Options>Video>Larger screen resolution?
